body_html:
Opened protocolbuffers/protobuf#1402.

What is the Bazel command run for http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-cpu-python3/262/consoleFull? I tried bazel test //... but I got an error about the BUILD file for gmock not being found:

❯❯❯ bazel test //...
ERROR: /usr/local/google/home/dzc/Projects/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl:21:3: no such package '@gmock_archive//': In new_http_archive rule //external:gmock_archive the 'build_file' attribute does not specify an existing file (/usr/local/google/home/dzc/Projects/tensorflow/tensorflow/google/protobuf/gmock.BUILD does not exist) and referenced by '//external:gtest'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.190s
ERROR: Couldn't start the build. Unable to run tests.

Edit: Found the problem. It was because it was looking for gmock.BUILD in google/protobuf. This will need to be changed.

body:
Opened google/protobuf#1402. 

What is the Bazel command run for http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-cpu-python3/262/consoleFull? I tried `bazel test //...` but I got an error about the BUILD file for gmock not being found:

```
❯❯❯ bazel test //...
ERROR: /usr/local/google/home/dzc/Projects/tensorflow/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl:21:3: no such package '@gmock_archive//': In new_http_archive rule //external:gmock_archive the 'build_file' attribute does not specify an existing file (/usr/local/google/home/dzc/Projects/tensorflow/tensorflow/google/protobuf/gmock.BUILD does not exist) and referenced by '//external:gtest'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.190s
ERROR: Couldn't start the build. Unable to run tests.
```

Edit: Found the problem. It was because it was looking for gmock.BUILD in `google/protobuf`. This will need to be changed.
